title: 2.1 Master Challenge 1
question:
Lucy’s visit to the park

Consider the following maze used by Lucy.Lucy devised an algorithm to
visit the park,as given below.

Step 1: Move 1 block forward.
Step 2: Turn right.
Step 3: Move 1 block forward.
Step 4: Turn left.
Step 5: Repeat steps 1 to 4 one more time.

Trace on the grid using Lucy’s algorithm to fi nd if she reaches the park.
If not, identify the errors and correct the algorithm to make Lucy reach the park.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
